definition: population (counted as number of households for census or taxation)/registered residence/residence permit/(in Hong Kong and Macau) bank account
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to apply for residence/to register a birth
PRC system of compulsory registration of households

sentences.english: Rights of Peasants account can also be non-GM farmers to move back home it?
sentences.chinese: 户口农转非啦还可以迁回家非转农吗？

sentences.english: Mortgaging rural land or even selling one's own house to non-villagers is banned.
sentences.chinese: 抵押农村土地，甚至买卖房屋给非农村户口是禁止的。

sentences.english: You may bank in directly to our bank account. Once you have banked in, please inform us.
sentences.chinese: 您可直接将捐款进入禅院户口，并通知禅院负责人。

sentences.english: Copy of Residence record, personal ID and passport.
sentences.chinese: 户口薄和身份证复印件及护照。

sentences.english: Please suppress the use of all Phone Banking Services for the above-mentioned Primary Account.
sentences.chinese: 请终止有关上述基本户口所有电话理财服务。

sentences.english: For years, it was virtually impossible for a Chinese to survive without a hukou.
sentences.chinese: 多年来，作为一个中国人离了户口基本上就寸步难移。

sentences.english: Please suppress the use of all ATM Services for the above-mentioned Primary Account.
sentences.chinese: 请终止有关上述基本户口所有自动柜员机服务。

sentences.english: Money already transferred into your acct, please chk.
sentences.chinese: 钱已经进了你的户口，请检查。

sentences.english: Everyone has a hukou in China.
You'd better send your certificate through registered post because it is safer.
sentences.chinese: 买房时不要忘了带户口本，这是很重要的证件。

sentences.english: OK finally by registered permanent residence this such effective certificate is dealt with afresh.
sentences.chinese: 最后可以凭户口本这样的有效证件重新办理。

sentences.english: Prospects for reform of the hukou system are only slightly better.
sentences.chinese: 而户口体系改革的前景也仅仅只好那么一点儿。

sentences.english: Guanxi University's national minority preparatory course shift certain if rural area registered permanent residence?
sentences.chinese: 广西大学的少数民族预科班一定要是农村户口么？

sentences.english: Will China's migrant workers get permanent urban residence in 2010?
sentences.chinese: 2010年中国农民工能否拿到城市户口？

sentences.english: Sooner or later, your name will appear in my family's account.
sentences.chinese: 早晚有一天你的名字会出现在我家的户口本上。

sentences.english: In order to do anything in China, you have to produce your hukou.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，做任何事情都需要出示户口。

definition: to apply for residence/to register a birth
social insurance/abbr. for 社會保險|社会保险
